default: 150g/5½oz penne pasta, cooked according to packet instructions
a few shavings of fresh white truffle, to serve

steps: Place the oil, parsley, garlic, chilli flakes and salt into a food processor and blend until smooth.
Stir the mixture into the cooked penne pasta, and pile onto a plate. Garnish with fresh torn basil leaves and the shavings of white truffle.
title: Penne with chilli, garlic, herbs and olive oil
